title: Title
story1: 11,000 unique PFP mummies candies. Each candy is wrapped in a bandage of various colors, and each race's face has almost a unique bandage pattern. One day, Candies are mummified by someone, and the world begins.
description: All mummy candies have almost unique bandage patterns on their faces. It even applies to each race(11 races below). So there are about 11,000 unique facial bandage patterns.

answer8: Mummy Candy will receive 6% of all secondary sales.
